name: Untitled Dishonored fan game
description:
A fan game for dishonored!  you play as a witch- Current abilities are Blink, Clairvoyance and Thorns.

Alt+F4 quits the game

Keyboard 1 activates blink, which is a short range teleport.

Keyboard 2 activates Clairvoyance, which lets you see useful items through walls.

Keyboard 3 activates Thorns, which are basically magic crossbow bolts.

Keyboard 4 activates Time Bend, which may or may not be an official power.

Right mouse button casts a power, Left mouse button attacks with the sword.

wasd to move, Shift to sprint, C toggles crouch

there is a total of 205 coins in the map

Game in early development

suggestions more than welcome!

Version Alpha 1.1

Outsider's mark alt design by u/Ruka-Bartender on reddit
